description: Alterations to front garden; installation of gate; creation of boundary wall (following demolition of existing boundary wall); creation of roof over existing side extension; first floor side extension; alterations to front and rear fenestrations; rear roof extension incorporating two Juliet balconies; installation of four panels to front roofslope; installation of one rooflight to front roofslope; external alterations
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): 001 (location/block plan), 002 A (existing site plan), 004 B (existing ground floor plan), 005 A (existing first floor plan), 006 A (existing second floor plan), 008 A (existing roof plan), 009 A (existing front elevation), 015 A (existing front elevation with boundary wall), 010 (existing side elevation), 012 A (existing rear elevation), 013 A (existing section AA), 014 B (existing section BB), 3302 (proposed site plan), 3304 (proposed ground floor plan), 3305 (proposed first floor plan), 3306 A (proposed second floor plan), 3308 (proposed roof plan), 3309 A (proposed front elevation), 3315 (proposed front elevation with boundary wall), 3210 A (proposed side elevation), 3212 B (proposed rear elevation), 3213 (proposed section AA), 3114 A (proposed section BB).

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2024).
| The proposed solar panels to the front elevation shall not protrude more than 0.2m from the pane of the existing roofslope.

Reason: To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 2.1 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2016), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2024). | The proposed windows on the side elevations shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), policies policy 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012).
